start.header: Help with the 'ID Check' app or your online immigration account
start.p1: Use this service to get help with:
start.l1: using the 'UK Immigration: ID Check' app
start.l2: viewing and proving your immigration status, right to work, or right to rent online
start.l3: updating your UK Visas and Immigration account details
start.p2: You can only use this service if you have applied:
start.l4: to work and study in the UK
start.l5: for a Hong Kong BNO visa application
start.a: contact us if you are applying to the EU Settlement Scheme
start.l7: the email address that was used in the application - this is the email address that the confirmation email was sent to
start.l8: the 16-digit unique application number (UAN) or the number of the identity document (ID card or passport) used in the application
start.l9: your name if you are filling this form out for someone else
start.timeout: This service will time out after 30 minutes if there is no activity and you will have to start again. This is to protect your personal information.

identity.header: Are you contacting us on behalf of someone else?

what-happens-next.p1: We've sent your enquiry to the online help team.
what-happens-next.p2: They will contact you within 5 working days with an answer to your problem, or to ask for more information.
what-happens-next.a: What did you think of this service?
